title: Improve Exceptions for WinRT/UWP
body: Actually, exceptions thrown by UWP APIs are just painfully awful. Please, bring back old-schoold and detailed exceptions like in the rock solid .NET for Win32.

comments.body: Agreed. The terrible exceptions have caused me to go back to sprinkling Debug.WriteLine calls throughout my code. I feel like I'm programming Windows 3 in 1990 again.

for example, in case of async methods, the debugger does not break at the place where exception occurs, but at the place where the method is awaited without possibility to move back in call stack although the information is present in stack trace.
